text: 1 star wouldn't be fair but two is totally earned and deserved. Service is slow and food is usually just warm. Tonight's experience is why I'm here tonight. I dont know if the owners changed or what but both Pizza Huts have been on a decline for a few years now. At least Galesburg has plenty of other pizza options.
